name: Certis CISCO Security Pte Ltd

reviews.text: 27 penjuru walk,The security guards were unprofessional and rude to visitors. The supervisors did not handle the visitors' complaints. You should go back to school and learn what is polite.
Excellent place that builds a smart, better and safe future ðŸ˜‰
Cisco had already reduce to a stage where they need to hire gangster like personnel to carry out their job.

I just don't want to give any damn star for this. 1:30pm tuas checkpoint just now, 1 girl + boy behaviour just come and check our car without inform us what the issue and anything. You guys can't check the car without inform us. You are wasting our time. Can we declare for timing you take for checking my car and when she check my bag and my husband's bag she didn't ask for permission is this what your guys teaching in training for 1month+. Don't know to behave also. Damn ya. As I know we come here for money but give respect take respect. We all same man. She check my car for 5min to 10mins , she didn't found anything then she ask us to go, no sorry no anything. She hold her pass to not show her name. Short girl with boy hair Style and wearing spec. Try to send some of the staff for training. 0% behavior. Damn attitude. Spoil the country name.

My son was humiliated and yelled  vulgarities at by one of your uneducated unprofessional hooligan instructor by the name of Sascha Soliano! Certis wake up and do some background checks on the people that you hire!
